pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genotype Calling for Bi-Allelic Marker Assays // Genotyping assays for bi-allelic markers (e.g. SNPs) produce signal intensities for the two alleles. 'fitPoly' assigns genotypes (allele dosages) to a collection of polyploid samples based on these signal intensities. 'fitPoly' replaces the older package 'fitTetra' that was limited (a.o.) to only tetraploid populations whereas 'fitPoly' accepts any ploidy level. Reference: Voorrips RE, Gort G, Vosman B (2011) doi:10.1186/1471-2105-12-172.
